- The [93mchromatin[0m [93mremodeler[0m [93mSMARCA5[0m [93mbinds[0m to [93md[0m-[93mblock[0m [93mmetal[0m [93msupports[0m: [93mCharacterization[0m of [93maffinities[0m by [93mIMAC[0m [93mchromatography[0m and [93mQM[0m [93manalysis[0m.: The [93mISWI[0m [93mfamily[0m [93mprotein[0m [93mSMARCA5[0m [93mcontains[0m the [93mATP[0m-[93mbinding[0m [93mpocket[0m that [93mcoordinates[0m the [93mcatalytic[0m [93mMg2[0m+ [93mion[0m and [93mwater[0m [93mmolecules[0m for [93mATP[0m [93mhydrolysis[0m. In this [93mstudy[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mdemonstrate[0m that [93mSMARCA5[0m [93mcan[0m [93malso[0m [93mpossess[0m an [93malternative[0m [93mmetal[0m-[93mbinding[0m [93mability[0m. [93mFirst[0m, [93mwe[0m [93misolated[0m [93mSMARCA5[0m on the [93mcobalt[0m [93mcolumn[0m ([93mIMAC[0m) to [93mnear[0m [93mhomogeneity[0m. [93mExamination[0m of the [93minteractions[0m of [93mSMARCA5[0m with [93mmetal[0m-[93mchelating[0m [93msupports[0m [93mshowed[0m that, [93mapart[0m from [93mCo2[0m+, it [93mbinds[0m to [93mCu2[0m+, [93mZn2[0m+ and [93mNi2[0m+. The [93mefficiency[0m of the [93mbinding[0m to the [93mlast[0m-[93mlisted[0m [93mmetal[0m was [93minfluenced[0m by the [93mchelating[0m [93mligand[0m, [93mresulting[0m in a [93mstrong[0m [93mpreference[0m for [93mNi[0m-[93mNTA[0m over the [93mNi[0m-[93mCM[0m-[93mAsp[0m [93mequivalent[0m. - [93mMetallo[0m-[93mOrganic[0m [93mComplexes[0m [93mContaining[0m [93mTransition[0m [93mMetals[0m; [93mSynthetic[0m [93mApproaches[0m and [93mPharmaceutical[0m [93mAspects[0m.: [93mCoordination[0m [93mcompounds[0m [93moffer[0m a [93mflexible[0m [92mframework[0m for the [93mthoughtful[0m [92mdesign[0m of [93mnovel[0m [93mtherapeutic[0m-[93mmetallodrugs[0m because of the [93munique[0m [93mproperties[0m of [93mmetal[0m [93mions[0m, [93msuch[0m as [93mtheir[0m [93mability[0m to [93mcoordinate[0m with a [93mwide[0m [93mrange[0m of [93morganic[0m [93mligands[0m, [93mvariable[0m [93moxidation[0m [93mstates[0m, a [93mwide[0m [93mrange[0m of [93mgeometries[0m, and [93mcoordination[0m [93mnumbers[0m. The [93mpharmaceutical[0m [93mpotential[0m of a [93mmetal[0m [93mion[0m and [93massociated[0m [93msubstances[0m is [95mvalidated[0m by the [93mprevalence[0m of [93mvarious[0m [93mdisease[0m [93mstates[0m [93mlinked[0m to a [93mmetal[0m [93mion[0m'[93ms[0m [93mexcess[0m or [93mdeficiency[0m within the [93mbiological[0m [92msystem[0m. [93mResearchers[0m [93mhave[0m [93msought[0m [93mmore[0m [93mselective[0m, [93mefficacious[0m [93mmetallodrugs[0m that [93mcause[0m [93mfewer[0m [93madverse[0m [93meffects[0m. [93mAttempts[0m [93mhave[0m [93mresulted[0m in [93mconsidering[0m a [93mlarge[0m [93mrange[0m of [93morganic[0m [93mligands[0m, [93mpreferably[0m [93mpolydentate[0m [93mligands[0m with [93mdemonstrated[0m [93mbiological[0m [93mactivity[0m, and a [93mlarge[0m [93mrange[0m of [93mmetals[0m from the [93mperiodic[0m [93mtable[0m, [93mprimarily[0m from the [93md[0m-[93mblock[0m.
